attributes.action: Educate middle lane road hogs on how not be a middle lane road hogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our motorways are clogged and slowed down by the amount of middle lane road hogs. They are a danger to other road users who have to go from lane 1 to lane 3 or 4 in order to over take them legally and correctly. 
This causes no end of motorway tail backs as we the driving majority have to queue up to overtake an empty lane.

Can we have on the overhead signs and on the road a simple "Keep left unless over taking" notice.

This will help our road hogs understand how they should drive on the road. 
Its a very easy to implement system which I have seen used to very successfully in other countries. 
It is simple and easy to understand.
